src:
Biar Nggak Tertipu Diskon Abal-abal di Harbolnas, Baca Tips Ini
07 Nov 2019, 09:52 by Vadhia Lidyana


Foto: Vadhia Lidyana/detikFinance

Jakarta - Harbolnas 2019 sudah semakin dekat. Diskon besar-besaran hingga 90% sudah menanti para penggila belanja online. Namun, detikers harus tahu cara menghindari diskon-diskon fiktif yang rentan terjadi di pesta belanja online. Perlu diketahui, diskon fiktif adalah penggelembungan harga produk dari harga asli, baru diberikan diskon. Bagaimana caranya menghindari diskon fiktif tersebut? Baca selengkapnya di sini:(hns/hns)
text:
So as not to be fooled into fake discounts at Harbolnas, read these tips
Nov 7 2019, 09:52 by Vadhia Lidyana


Photo: Vadhia Lidyana / detikFinance

Jakarta - Harbolnas 2019 is getting closer. Massive discounts up to 90% are waiting for online shopping enthusiast. However, detikers must know how to avoid fictitious discounts that are vulnerable to occur at online shopping parties. Keep in mind, fictitious discounts are inflated product prices from the original price, then given a discount. How do you avoid these fictitious discounts? Read more here: (hns / hns)
